definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: When did admitting you can’t afford something become shameful?
sentences.chinese: 在什麼時候承認你買不起一些東西會變得羞愧難當呢？

sentences.english: Jiangchuan for the failure of shame, she is going to cut abdomen to the emperor to malaysians.
sentences.chinese: 江川爲這次的失敗羞愧難當，她準備切腹向天皇謝罪。

sentences.english: Their answers , it turns out , put many of those poets and philosophers to shame .
sentences.chinese: 結果他們所給的答案，使許多詩人和哲學家羞愧難當。

sentences.english: I felt ashamed as I weakly told him the real reason.
sentences.chinese: 我把真實原因告訴他時，底氣不足，羞愧難當。
